description: This document demonstrates key components used to create audio responses.

item.description: The Mixer component plays a set of audio clips at the same time. See docs for more information.

items.description: The Sequencer component plays a series of audio clips one after another.

items.content: 'To use Playlist Helper. First you must be playing a song using Spotify. <break time="0.5s"/>.
Add songs by saying add song to and then the name of a valid created playlist from your account <break time="0.5s"/>.
'Confirm you have added a song by saying What song did I add? <break time="0.5s"/>.
Finally you can remove previously added songs by saying remove song <break time="0.5s"/>.
